Parameters: AudioEffect: the effect on which the interface is registered.
boolean: true if the application has been granted control of the effect engine, false otherwise.
onControlStatusChange(android.media.audi.Description: Called on the listener to notify it that the effect engine control has been taken or returned.
onControlStatusChange(android.media.audi.FullName: public abstract void onControlStatusChange (AudioEffect effect, boolean controlGranted)

ClassDesc: The OnControlStatusChangeListener interface defines a method called by the AudioEffect when control of the effect engine is gained or lost by the application
